caller_intent: Charlie Parsons is checking in about vehicle insurance estimates and confirming coverage changes (removing coverages effective the policy renewal date) for his 2012 Jeep Cherokee and other vehicles.
resolution_steps: Heather clarifies the vehicle details (2012 Jeep Cherokee) and confirms the estimate amount ($2,200–$2,300).
Discusses confusion about coverage changes (removing comprehensive/collision on two vehicles not owned or used).
Notes that changes were applied effective September 5 instead of the intended renewal date (September 28).
Mentions contacting National General (carrier) to resolve discrepancies and will follow up later.
knowledge_required: Understanding insurance policy coverage types (comprehensive, collision, liability).
Process for adjusting coverage effective dates.
summary: Charlie Parsons discusses vehicle insurance estimates and coverage changes with Heather. Heather clarifies policy details, notes a discrepancy in effective dates, and confirms follow-up with National General. The call ends with a commitment to update Charlie once carrier communication is resolved.
